EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t miss out on NCS - info needed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Don’t miss out on NCS - your admin fee
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
{!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"","It’s great that you want to take part in National Citizen Service (NCS) – but we don’t want you to miss out because of a missing admin fee!
")} {!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"We’ve contacted your parent or guardian to explain that we’ve received your application to take part in NCS, as part of your course, and saved you a place. We’ve let them know that they need to pay the "+TEXT(Contact.Amount_due_outstanding__c)+" admin fee. This discounted fee will go up to £50 after "+TEXT(Contact.School_s_discount_deadline__c)+".","We’ve contacted your parent or guardian to explain that we’ve temporarily saved you a provisional place on NCS but they need to pay your admin fee to keep your provisional place. Remember, your NCS admin fee will be a maximum of £50.")}
We also explained how they can ask for financial assistance if they need help with the cost, because we would never want the cost to stop you taking part.
{!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"So, please ask your parent or guardian to pay or to contact us with any problems.","We can only save your provisional place on NCS until "+TEXT(Contact.Letter_email_date_reserved_place_lost__c)+" without this payment, so please ask your parent or guardian to pay or to contact us if they need any help with the payment so we can have a chat.")} They can pay by: logging in to their account on our website at bookings.ncsthechallenge.org, or calling us on 0203 542 2400 to pay over the phone, or arrange sending us a cheque.
{!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"This is part of your college course so make sure you get this done!
","")} Any questions? Get in touch by emailing us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org or calling us on 0203 542 2400.
{!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"","Speak to your parent or guardian as soon as you can to give yourself the best chance of taking part in this once-in-a-lifetime experience.
")} {!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"Have a great week!","Kind regards,")}
